name: Online Cars Multiplayer Demo
description:
Onlne Multiplayer Demo of a toy car game, source code available here https://github.com/rafalfaro18/unity-online-multiplayer-demo .

WASD = move car

Select Host option on multiplayer menu to act as server.

Run a second window of the game and select client option to connect to the server.  Select the window of the car that you want to move and move it with WASD.
